content.name: html_buttons
html_buttons
html_26
content.content:
UNHCR Article

Please check all details before submiting this form. Content will be sent to the target audience immediately.

content.name: text_image
content.label: Image URL
content.description: An optional "hero" image that will display in the timeline with the article. Take care to ensure you provide a valid link address

content.name: text_articleUrl
content.label: Aritcle URL
content.description: An optional URL for an externally hosted article that can be opened from the app

config.name: css_2

params.name: sourceLocale
params.description: Locale of the text passed in

params.name: targetLocale
params.description: Locale to be translated to (needs to differ from sourceLocale)

operations.name: updateMessage
operations.summary: Update the outcome of a message

params.name: messageId
params.description: id of message to be updated

params.name: messageStatusId
params.description: status of the message being saved

params.name: statusReason
params.description: reason for recjection of the message

params.name: userProfileId
params.description: Id of the user thet the profile belongs to

operations.name: getUsers
operations.summary: Get Donor and Refugee user accounts

params.name: articleUrl
params.description: Optional article link for a more in depth article

functions.name: toggle
functions.description:
Toggles the menu opened and closed based on the value
of the this.opened property (initially set to false)

params.name: containerid
params.description: id of container the popup is in
